body:
- Updated world event dates and times to be consistent
- Added gem promos to repeating world events
- Added G1G1 to repeating world events

Additionally, in [this line](https://github.com/HabitRPG/habitica/blob/d3b63abdd33c2de769e44b277addb5314dfbd986/test/content/events.test.js#L13) in the events test, the faked date has to be changed from January 6th to p.e. January 8th.

The failing tests are due to the g1g1 event.

The ones that are failing bc it is expecting 1 event instead of 2 just needs the numbers changed to 2.
The one failing bc no event Is supposed to be returned needs a later date for checking.
